itemDescription: Composer for BBC Dr Who Audiobooks

wikipedia_page.main: Simon Power (born 14 February 1958) is an English composer & sound designer, best known for his work on the BBC's Classic Novelisation range of Doctor Who audiobooks.

response: * "Powerhouse", an alias used by the composer Simon Power for his 1988 hit "On the Floor"
*Simon Power (composer) (born 1958), English composer and sound designer
